channel.title: Shortcodes on ZhouShen

item.title: Shortcodes
item.description: In addition to all the default Hugo shortcodes, Blowfish adds a few extras for additional functionality. Alert # alert outputs its contents as a stylised message box within your article. It’s useful for drawing attention to important information that you don’t want the reader to miss.
